Geoblink | Madrid | Frontend Developer | Full-time, 40% Remote

Weâ€™re a fast growing startup that has already raised close to $8 million in investment from leading venture capital firms, and have been named by Bloomberg as one of 50 most promising startups in the world to look out for. Our goal is to revolutionise the world of Location Intelligence and the way businesses think about, and act upon location intelligence data. Salary is DOE but somewhere between 35K-45K Euros.

If you are interested you can send your CV here: https://geoblink.workable.com/jobs/765131 or email jobs@gebolink.com for more info!
